EmailTemplate.description: Email to parter when their lead completes their application
EmailTemplate.name: Lead's Application Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Lead.Name} has submitted their Community Solar application!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Partner_Name__c},
{!Lead.Name} has submitted their Community Solar application.
Once we have reviewed and approved their application, we will complete the process by sending {!Lead.Name} their final documentation.
You can view where an opportunity stands in the quality control (QC) process by referencing the outstanding QC task report, which is sent biweekly by email. This report will show any items which need your attention before an opportunity can be pushed through to completion.
Thanks for partnering with us to revolutionize energy.
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Partner Support 888.817.2703 | partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com
